widgets.title: Optimize underutilized/incorrectly-sized EC2 instances
widgets.description: Many organizations pay for computing power they don't fully utilize. JupiterOne provides insights to right-size or decommission underutilized, inactive, or incorrectly-sized EC2 and RDS instances, driving significant cost savings while maintaining performance.

queries.name: Query 1
queries.query:
FIND Host 
WITH _type != "mapped_entity" 
AND instanceType != undefined 
AND state = "running" AS a 
RETURN 
COUNT(a), a._type, a.state, a.instanceClass, a.instanceType, a.active, a.dbInstanceClass

widgets.title: DB Cluster Snapshot Usage per Account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND aws_db_cluster_snapshot with _source!="system-mapper" and allocatedStorage!=undefined as b 
  return b.tag.AccountName as Account, 
    SUM(b.allocatedStorage) as TotalSizeInGB, 
    AVG(b.allocatedStorage) as AverageSizeInGB, 
    MAX(b.allocatedStorage) as LargestSnapshotInGB,
    COUNT(b) as TotalSnapshots ORDER BY AverageSizeInGB DESC

widgets.title: Top 10 AWS S3 Buckets Size and Cost

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_s3_bucket with bucketSizeBytes!=undefined as bucket 
return 
    bucket.name as Name, 
    bucket.tag.AccountName as Account, 
    bucket.numberOfObjects as "Number of Objects", 
    bucket.bucketSizeBytes / 1000000000 as SizeInGB, 
    bucket.bucketSizeBytes / 1000000000 * 0.023 as "Monthly Cost", 
    bucket.lifecycleEnabled, bucket.retentionPeriod
order by bucket.bucketSizeBytes DESC limit 10

widgets.title: Inactive Instances (during the past 60 days)

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find Host with active = false and stateChangedOn < date.now - 60 day as h
    return h.displayName as Name,
    h.accountId as AccountId,
    h.tag.AccountName as Account,
    h.hibernationOptionsConfigured,
    h.instanceType as Type,
    h.public,
    h.stateChangedOn

widgets.title: EIPS used by an Inactive EC2 Instance

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_eip 
    that uses aws_instance WITH active != true AND state = 'stopped'

queries.name: query2
queries.query: find aws_eip that !(uses|has) *

widgets.title: Unused or Unrelated Resources: disks, elastic IPs, NAT gateways, load balancers, orphaned snapshots
widgets.description: Unused resources like unattached disks, idle elastic IPs, and orphaned snapshots are common culprits of cloud waste. JupiterOneâ€™s analysis uncovers these hidden costs, recommending clean-up actions that free up resources and reduce monthly cloud spend.

queries.name: Query 1
queries.query:
FIND (Backup | Disk | aws_eip) AS a
THAT !RELATES TO *
 RETURN COUNT(a) as '# of Resources', a._type as 'AWS Resource Type'

widgets.title: EBS volumes attached to inactive EC2 instances

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_ebs_volume as e 
    that USES aws_instance with active!=true 
    return 
        e.displayName as Name, 
        e.encrypted as Encrypted, 
        e.size as Size, 
        e.volumeType as Type

widgets.title: High Snapshot Monthly Costs

queries.name: Query 1
queries.query:
find aws_ebs_snapshot as i
return i.displayName as snapshotName, i.owner as owner, i.volumeSizeas as snapshotVolumeSize, i.createdOn as createdOn, i.volumeSize * 0.05 as monthlyCostUSD
order by monthlyCostUSD DESC

widgets.title: EC2 Usage Across Organization by Type

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_instance with instanceType!=undefined as a 
    return a.instanceType as Type, 
    count(a) as Total,
    a.tag.AccountName as AccountName,
    a.accountId as AccountID

widgets.title: EBS Snapshot Usage Per Account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND aws_ebs_snapshot with volumeSize!=undefined as b 
  return b.tag.AccountName as Account, 
    SUM(b.volumeSize) as TotalSize, 
    AVG(b.volumeSize) as AverageSize, 
    MAX(b.volumeSize) as LargestSnapshot,
    COUNT(b) as TotalSnapshots ORDER BY AverageSize DESC

widgets.title: Elastic IPs not using an ENI

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_eip 
    that !uses aws_eni

widgets.title: Disks not not in use

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find Disk with _class!='Backup' as d
    that !uses (Host|Configuration)
    return
        d.displayName as Name,
        d.tag.AccountName as Account,
        d.size as SizeInGB,
        d.sizeGB as SizeInGB,
        d.diskSizeBytes as "Size in Bytes",
        d.diskSizeGb as SizeInGB
        order by SizeInGB DESC

widgets.title: All DynamoDB Tables Size and Cost

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_dynamodb_table with active=true as table 
return table.displayName as Name, 
table.tag.AccountName as Account,
table.continuousBackupEnabled,
table.hasBackup,
table.itemCount,
table.tableSizeBytes / 1000000000 as SizeInGB,
table.tableSizeBytes / 1000000000 * 0.25 as "Monthly Cost", 
 order by SizeInGB DESC

widgets.title: S3 Total and Average Bucket Size by Account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_s3_bucket with bucketSizeBytes!=undefined as b 
return 
b.tag.AccountName as Account, 
SUM(b.bucketSizeBytes) / 1000000000 as TotalSizeInGB, 
AVG(b.bucketSizeBytes) / 1000000000 as AverageSizeInGB ORDER BY AverageSizeInGB DESC

widgets.title: Monthly Database Backup Cost

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find (aws_db_cluster_snapshot|aws_db_snapshot) as snapshot
Return
    snapshot.displayName as Name,
    snapshot.tag.AccountName as Account,
    snapshot.allocatedStorage as StorageInGB,
    sum(snapshot.allocatedStorage) * 0.02 as EstimatedCost
    ORDER BY snapshot.allocatedStorage DESC

widgets.title: All S3 Buckets Ordered By Size

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_s3_bucket with bucketSizeBytes!=undefined as b 
return b.bucketSizeBytes / 1000000000 as SizeInGB, 
b.bucketName as "Name", 
b.createdOn as "Creation Date",  
b.tag.AccountName as Account
ORDER BY SizeInGB DESC

widgets.title: EBS Volume Usage per Account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND aws_ebs_volume with size!=undefined as b 
  return b.tag.AccountName as Account, 
    SUM(b.size) as TotalSize, 
    AVG(b.size) as AverageSize, 
    MAX(b.size) as LargestVolume,
    COUNT(b) as TotalVolume ORDER BY AverageSize DESC

widgets.title: EC2 instances using more than one EIP

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_eip 
    that uses aws_instance
    that uses aws_eip

widgets.title: Inactive External Identities

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find AccessRole with lastUsedOn < date.now-15 day as Role 
    THAT TRUSTS * with _source="system-mapper" as ext
    RETURN ext.displayName as "External Identity", Role.tag.AccountName as Account, Role.accountId as AccountId, Role.displayName as "Role Name", Role._key, Role.lastUsedOn

widgets.title: All S3 Buckets Size and Cost

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_s3_bucket with bucketSizeBytes!=undefined as bucket 
    return 
        bucket.name as Name, 
        bucket.tag.AccountName as Account, 
        bucket.numberOfObjects as "Number of Objects", 
        bucket.bucketSizeBytes / 1000000000 as SizeInGB, 
        bucket.bucketSizeBytes / 1000000000 * 0.023 as "Monthly Cost", 
        bucket.lifecycleEnabled, bucket.retentionPeriod 
        ORDER BY bucket.bucketSizeBytes DESC

widgets.title: AWS Database Backup Cost per Account

queries.name: query0
queries.query:
FIND (aws_db_cluster_snapshot|aws_db_snapshot) as snapshot
  RETURN
    snapshot.tag.AccountName as name,
    sum(snapshot.allocatedStorage) * 0.02 as value

widgets.title: Prune Backups
widgets.description: Redundant or outdated backups consume unnecessary storage and incur costs. JupiterOne can identify and help manage backup pruning strategies, ensuring efficient storage use and reducing expenses without compromising data recovery capabilities.

queries.name: Query 1
queries.query:
FIND Backup AS a 
RETURN 
COUNT(a), a._type, a.allocatedStorage, a.crossRegion, a.storageType

widgets.title: AWS Regions in Use across Accounts

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find UNIQUE * with _integrationType="aws" and region!=undefined as a
    RETURN a.region as AWSRegion, count(a.accountId) as NumberOfAccounts

widgets.title: EIPs Not Currently Utilized

queries.name: query1
queries.query: Find aws_eip that !(USES|HAS) *
